top.parak.kraft.core.node.store

类 FileNodeStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.parak.kraft.core.node.store.FileNodeStore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    NodeStore

    public class FileNodeStore
extends Object
implements NodeStore
    Store node status via file.

    Structure of node file

    FileNodeStore use SeekableFile to store node's status, included the current term of node and the voted for of node. The file will use 4 bytes to record the current term of node and 4 bytes to record the length of the voted for of node, then use unfixed bytes to record the content of the voted for of node. 
     +---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+
 |        int(4)       |        int(4)       |        bytes        |
 +---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+
 |     current term    |  length of votedFor |       votedFor      |
 +---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+
    从以下版本开始:
    2022-04-06
    作者:
    KHighness
